name: Neon Rush (Valkoy)
description:
This is a scaling shooter with ability upgrades. Enemies get harder the longer you play.

Money is gained from killing enemies and can be used against upgrades to maintain your advantage against strengthening enemies.

Be sure to reload on death / getting stuck to avoid unwanted effects. Have fun!

Arrow Keys - Move, Down - Descend, Space - Jump, Left Shift - Dash,  Mouse Click to Shoot

Wall jump by jumping onto wall, release arrow key,  click space, press arrow key. Wall jumping is required to win the game!

Click upgrade buttons to gain upgrades

Hint: Light up the 4 artifacts (found in the 4 cardinal directions) to activate the teleporter on the left. Enter the activated teleporter to win!

Thanks to Robert for his tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset
